outline:
1. to pledge, exchange, mortgage, engage, occupy, undertake for, give pledges, be or become surety, take on pledge, give in pledge
    1. (Qal)
      1. to take on pledge, go surety for
      2. to give in pledge
      3. to exchange
      4. to pledge
    2. (Hithpael)
      1. to exchange pledges
      2. to have fellowship with, share
kjv_def: engage, (inter-) meddle (with), mingle (self), mortgage, occupy, give pledges, be(-come, put in) surety, undertake.
strongs_def: to braid, i.e. intermix; technically, to traffic (as if by barter); also or give to be security (as a kind of exchange)
